bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names shi du 螫毒.

Pathological Condition of poisoning resulting from poison entering the body in the course of a bite or sting by an animal with poisonous glands. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 治蜘蛛咬毒方 , “Recipes to cure poisoning resulting from the bites of spiders”. Bite poisonings documented in the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 include she yao du 蛇咬毒 , snake bite poisoning; kuang quan yao du 狂犬咬毒 , mad dog bite poisoning; ying yi yao du 蠅蟻咬毒 , fly and ant bite poisoning; xie yao du 蠍咬毒 ; scorpion bite (sic!) poisoning.
